s: Fontana Forni is an Italian pizza oven company. All pizza ovens are made in Italy with heavy duty construction and innovative designs. We have tradition and experience since 1978. Our ovens have precise temperature control and maximum insulation. We offer unparalleled performance and options.

t: • Company Origins: Italian Brand Ovens | Fontanaforni.com
s: January 18, 2024 - Giuseppe’s brothers, Carlo and ... FONTANA brand was born. 1970. The Fontana brothers open their first factory of 1000 square metres and purchase the first mechanical shears and bending machines: metalworking is born. 1975. The energy crisis also hits Italy and forces the Fontana family to reinvent itself: the world’s first metal furnace with indirect firing is born and with it the FONTANA FORNI ...
